    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [#if]                                   1         4
    [(]                                     4         5
    [ ]                                     5         6
    [$XHTML]                                6         12
    [ ]                                     12        13
    [)\n]                                   13        15
L2
    [    #set(]                             1         10
    [ ]                                     10        11
    [$br]                                   11        14
    [ ]                                     14        15
    [=]                                     15        16
    [ ]                                     16        17
    ["<br />"]                              17        25
    [ ]                                     25        26
    [)\n]                                   26        28
L3
    [    ]                                  1         5
    [#if]                                   5         8
    [ ]                                     8         9
    [(]                                     9         10
    [$someValue]                            10        20
    [)\n]                                   20        22
L4
    [        ]                              1         9
    [#if]                                   9         12
    [ ]                                     12        13
    [(]                                     13        14
    [$otherValue]                           14        25
    [)\n]                                   25        27
L5
    [            do stuff\n        ]        1         9
L6
    [#end\n]                                9         14
L7
    [    ]                                  1         5
    [#end\n]                                5         10
L8
    [#else\n]                               1         7
L9
    [    #set(]                             1         10
    [ ]                                     10        11
    [$br]                                   11        14
    [ ]                                     14        15
    [=]                                     15        16
    [ ]                                     16        17
    ["<br>"]                                17        23
    [ ]                                     23        24
    [)\n]                                   24        26
L10
    [#end\n]                                1         6
EOF
